welcome_message: Hello! I am an AI News Bot. Ready to serve you the latest summarized news.
help_message:
Available commands:
/start - Check if the bot is alive
/help - Show this help message
/settings - View and change bot settings (Admin Only)
/setadmin - Grant/revoke admin privileges (Superadmin Only)
/set_target - Set the posting destination for a news category (Admin Only)
/fetch_now - Manually trigger the news fetching process (Admin Only)
/fetch_stop - Stop the current news fetching process (Admin Only)
/cancel - Cancel the current operation
settings_error: An error occurred while fetching settings. Please check the bot logs.
settings_empty: No settings found in the database. The bot may need to be restarted.
ask_for_new_ai_prompt: Please send the new AI Prompt.
ask_for_new_post_limit: Please send the new post limit (must be a number).
ask_for_new_gemini_model: Please select the new AI model:
ask_for_new_msg_template: Please send the new message template. Available Placeholders: {title} - The article title {summary} - The AI-generated summary {description} - The original short description of the article {link} - The URL link to the original article {topic_name} - The category/topic of the news source {source_name} - The domain name of the news source {date} - The date the article is posted by the bot {publish_date} - The original publication date of the article {publish_time} - The original publication time of the article Supported HTML Tags: <b>Bold text</b> ‚Üí Bold text <i>Italic text</i> ‚Üí Italic text Example Usage: <b>{title}</b> #{topic_name} {summary} üìÖ {publish_date} at {publish_time} | üì∞ {source_name} <a href="{link}">Read More</a>
ask_for_new_schedule: Please send the new schedule interval (in minutes, e.g., 60).
ask_for_rss_max_age: Please send the maximum age for RSS articles (in hours, e.g., 24).
ask_for_approval_chat_id: Please send the Chat ID for approval notifications. This can be a user ID or a group ID (for groups, use a negative sign, e.g., -100123456). Send 0 to default to the Superadmin's chat.
ask_for_edited_summary: Please send the new edited summary for this post. You can copy, paste, and modify the text from the original message.
invalid_input_not_a_number: Invalid input. Please provide a number.
